name: Kitchen Simulator 2
description: Ever wanted to own your own restaurant? Well now you can with Kitchen Simulator 2. Customer satisfaction is your main aim, try and serve as many customers as you can, without leaving to many disappointed before the day ends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit or 64-bit Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 32-bit or 64-bit Processor: i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
